text-1: This year, at Hyperloop UPV, we are committed to a fully scalable vision, a new prototype vehicle, and its infrastructure. The way to achieve this is by surrounding ourselves with companies willing to be part of this team, as only together will we make an impact on society.
text-2: Betting on Hyperloop UPV not only means building the transportation of the future together, but also presents a series of advantages for the present of our sponsors.
